留言內容: This shirt is crafted from a soft, lightweight, and wrinkle-free fabric that resembles polyester. It provides a comfortable and stylish feel, making it ideal for beachwear or vacation trips. Available in various sizes, colors, and patterns, it's advisable to consult the size chart before ordering; in my case, the size M offered a perfect fit.The attractive buttons on the shirt contribute to its overall stylish appearance. This shirt can be easily machine-washed, adding to its convenience. The overall stitching is of high quality, showcasing excellent craftsmanship.In conclusion, this shirt is a delightful product to try, offering satisfaction with its comfort, style, and overall quality.This can be one of the good option to gift someone as well.

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣印花沙灘襯衫
留言內容: The colors on this Hawaiian shirt are unreal! They look so good in the sun but it’s also the perfect look for sunset. I’m very happy with this purchase, the shirt is so soft and cuddly.

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣印花沙灘襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 海軍藍
留言內容: I'm 6ft 220lbs with a medium build. I ordered the XL size and wore this shirt out the other night with some friends and it just fit really nice. It wasn't baggy and yet it wasn't overly tight, fit just perfectly.The material feels like very good quality material and breeze very well. You'll definitely feel like a classy yet casual person when you wear this shirt.

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣印花沙灘襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 棕色
留言內容: Look, I'll admit it. My fashion sense usually involves a tie so tight it could choke a boa constrictor and a suit that screams "accountant, not accountant by choice." But a recent trip to Hawaii (and a generous margarita) changed everything. Enter the COOFANDY Hawaiian shirt: a floral explosion of color that's as comfortable as a hammock and as eye-catching as a flamingo in a tutu.First Impressions:Ripping open the package, I was greeted by a rainbow of hibiscuses and palm trees that practically sang "Aloha!" The fabric? Soft enough to nap on, light enough to breathe in a volcanic heatwave. The fit? Relaxed, like a friendly hug from a beach bum.Island Adventures:This shirt wasn't just made for Mai Tais. It hiked volcanoes, snorkeled coral reefs, and even charmed my way into a luau with its sheer tropical swagger. I swear, coconuts were falling from the trees just to compliment me.Back to Reality (But Not Really):Back in the concrete jungle, this shirt is my silent rebellion. It's a reminder of sandy toes, salty hair, and the fact that life's too short to wear anything that doesn't make you feel like a dancing pineapple.Final Verdict:COOFANDY, you've changed me. I'm a new man, a man who embraces the island life, even if it's just in my living room with a tiki torch and a blender. Five stars, a lei, and a heartfelt "Mahalo!" This shirt is the gateway drug to paradise, and I'm a happy addict.Bonus Tip: Pair with a straw hat and an infectious grin for maximum island vibes. Trust me, the compliments will be as endless as the ocean.So, if you're tired of boring suits and yearn for a taste of the tropics, ditch the drab and grab a COOFANDY. It's not just a shirt, it's a portal to a world where worries melt faster than ice in a margarita. Aloha!

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣印花沙灘襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 海軍藍
留言內容: First time washing it and the blue color ran staining the white striping. Too bad, I really liked the shirt.

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣印花沙灘襯衫
留言內容: I've been wanting a "Hawaiian" style shirt, but for some reason, I've never purchased one. This shirt is quite nice! It is lightweight, and the fit is exactly as advertised (and as you would expect). The material and workmanship are also very nice. I suspect that I'll get a LOT of wear and use out of this shirt. Plus, the price for this shirt is very affordable.

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣印花沙灘襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 藍色
留言內容: This is a nice shirt. My husband loves it, and he's not a person that pays much attention to clothing. It is very lightweight and the colors are bright while not being shiny. The material has a cooling feel to it.The seams are straight without any hanging threads, the buttons are pretty good quality and small so they hardly show on the shirt - you barely notice them. The buttons are sewn on tight with three extra buttons sewn into the shirt for mishaps. This shirt washes and dries easily and nicely.The overall style of the shirt is tropical, cool, light. Fantastic summer shirt for going out on the town, to a birthday BBQ or to a graduation.The size of the shirt is so close to being true to size, it's just a tad small in the shoulders so if you're in-between sizes, order up a size.

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣印花沙灘襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 紅椰子樹
留言內容: The shirt is very stylish and very cool looking. You can pretty much wear this to any place hot or to the beach. It's wrinkle free and hassle free.

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣印花沙灘襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 藍色
留言內容: I ordered this shirt for my boyfriend for our Mexican vacation and it was perfect for the warm weather.  This shirt was lightweight, comfortable and stayed wrinkle free.  Even in the tropical weather of Mexico, he was cool in this shirt.  The fabric, the buttons and stitching all appear well made and very good quality.  The vibrant blue color matched our surroundings of clear skies and sparkling waters.  This was the perfect beach vacation shirt!

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣印花沙灘襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: XX-Large顏色: 紅椰子樹
留言內容: This is a great shirt! The buttons are nice and sturdy and stay buttoned while I'm moving around.  The fit is just right. The look of the shirt is nice and vibrant and I get a lot of compliments wearing it.  I wash this shirt and hang it up, no need to iron it because it doesn't get wrinkled.  It's lightweight and cool to wear, perfect for the summertime in Vegas. I've ordered quite a few different COOFANDY items in the past and I've never been disappointed with them. They make great quality clothes that are fun to wear.

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣印花沙灘襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: XX-Large顏色: 紅椰子樹
留言內容: I have always been a fan of tropical shirts from my time scuba diving and vacationing all over the Caribbean and Mexico where you find how different they are made.  This shirt has a real nice print on the other layer and includes a nice inner liner for a thicker quality shirt.  It also includes some really sharp looking buttons to match the print WITH and extra button included for replacement should you lose one of the original ones before being able to fix the holding treads.  This style shirt is usually worn loosely and on the larger size so you may want to order a size up than your regular size.  Al in all I am very happy with the look and feel of this shirt and the pattern generally lifts the mood of those around with the feel of nice warm places and memories at least with the  Red Coconut Tree design I got.  Love it.

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣印花沙灘襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 紫色與藍色
留言內容: This shirt looks exactly like it does in the pictures with the purple/blue shirt.  Wore this on a night out which was sweaty but I felt pretty comfortable with the material, since it's 100% polyester which is usually breathable and light-weight unlike cotton.  It's more so the non-stretchy polyester which is what I'd prefer in sort of dress shirts like this.  In terms of how it actually fits, I actually think it runs slightly larger than US standard; for example, I am 5'6" at 165 lbs and I usually get medium clothing and I got medium.  It didn't feel different at all in terms of fit except I noticed the arm sleeves were a little longer than I'm used to.  Overall, make sure you get the right size and perhaps consider ordering a size down.

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣印花沙灘襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 海軍藍
留言內容: I ordered the navy blue and white stripe shirt in a size L. The shirt fits just as I would expect it. It's silky, lightweight and comfortable. It's versatile and can be worn with slacks, jeans or a nice pair of shorts depending on your style. It looks really nice and not cheap.

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣印花沙灘襯衫
留言內容: I was worried this shirt would be really light weight and see through but I was pleasantly surprised.  You cannot see through the material and yet it is still a nice summer weight.  The colors are very vivid and the design is true to the picture.  I can't wait for our Mexico trip so my husband can wear this!

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣印花沙灘襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 黃色與綠色
留言內容: I like this Hawaiian shirt in that it deviates from the standard bright colors and palm tree designs. It fits as expected, feels comfortable, and looks good. I also do not wear green as much but after wearing this shirt I think I will wear more green now, lol. The chrome looking buttons are also nice looking, too. I am hoping the buttons will retain its color after multiple washes. Overall a very good value for a nice shirt.

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣印花沙灘襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: XX-Large顏色: 紅椰子樹
留言內容: This is one very nice fitting Hawaiian shirt. It's quality workmanship and material is great. The fabric stays wrinkle free and it is very soft and cool on the skin. This is a very nice shirt.

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款夏威夷襯衫短袖休閒鈕扣印花沙灘襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 棕色
留言內容: This shirt looks fantastic on my husband, and he says it's very comfortable. I've included a pic of him wearing it at a bowling alley - so it's definitely a comfortable shirt. The buttons have detailing on them which is subtle, but gives a little bit of extra which levels up the whole shirt. Material is lightweight.SIZING: My husband wears a Large in shirts and t shirts, sometimes an XL. He has this shirt in L and the fit is perfect - roomy without being sloppy, the shirt looks trim and is very flattering. For reference he is 6'1" tall, athletic build, about 200#.This shirt is nice enough to gift.
